extendedInfo.description: â â â Get ready for the best collection of inspirational quotes available on the app store â â âYou can look forward to inspiring quotes such as:"Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it." - Goethe"Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience." - Victoria Holt"Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate, our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond all measure" - Brown AlasdairAlso, check out what others have had to say, and when you have had a go, why not leave your own review. Any feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us to further enhance the product for you.

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: i like this app and how it\'s looks :) But how come beautiful app like this doesn\'t have widget on homescreen? I wish someday the widget will be as beautiful as the app design..anyway why bother compare with the other \"So Serious\" quotes app? Be different, be fun!
reviews.author: A Google User
